1.14.4.1.14.4-1.10.3.2: Fixed a crash related to death chest removal.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.10.3.1: Fixed shulker boxes in death chests being deleted when the death chests are broken.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.10.3.0:
Fixed Cubic Chunks compatibility.
The unlocker item no longer needs to have the required durability in creative mode.
The Unbreaking enchantment is now taken into account when an unlocker item is used.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.9.4.0:
Fixed a crash.
Added the disableDeathChests gamerule.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.9.3.1: Invalid configurations are now regenerated automatically.

1.12.2.1.12.2-1.10.3.1: Fixed shulker boxes in death chests being deleted when the death chests are broken.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.10.3.0:
The unlocker item no longer needs to have the required durability in creative mode.
The Unbreaking enchantment is now taken into account when an unlocker item is used.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.9.3.0:
Death chests are now forcibly placed by default if no valid locations are found.
Death chests now disappear when emptied by default.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.9.0.0:
Switched to RandomLib for configuration handling.
Fixed Baubles and Backpacks compatibility.
Added an option to make death chests disappear when they are emptied.
The display name of death chest containers can now be configured.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.8.0.2: Fixed explosions being able to destroy locked death chests.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.8.0.1: Fixed registry names being reset in the configuration.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.8.0.0:
Improved the CraftTweaker script format. Any existing scripts will have to be updated again.
Added a configurable chat/status message that shows when a player fails to unlock a death chest.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.7.1.0:
CraftTweaker support now only loads if Game Stages is also installed.
Renamed the CraftTweaker class from mods.VanillaDeathChest to mods.vanilladeathchest.DeathChestDefense.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.7.0.0:
Added Game Stages/CraftTweaker support for unlocker items and defense entities.
Defense entities no longer drop items or experience by default.
Defense entities no longer stray away from their death chests.
Added an option to set the defense entity NBT data.
Defense entities' revenge targets are now set every tick.
Added an option to make death chests only spawn on solid blocks.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.2.0: Improved the death chest/shulker box drop logic.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.0.1: Improved the death chest location search logic.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.6.0.0: Unlocker items and defense entities can now be configured.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1.5: On Minecraft Forge 1.12.2-14.23.5.2800 and higher, enum configuration properties are now localized.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1.2: Fixed the logo not showing up in the mods list.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1.0: Shulker box colors can now be randomized.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0.4: Death chest positions are now stored per world to avoid conflicts.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0.2: Minor tweaks to the configuration property comments.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.0.0:
Added shulker box spawning.
Replaced the spawning.useDoubleChests property with spawning.chestType.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.3.0.0:
Added more configuration options.
Fixed death chest save data.
Implemented death chest protection.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0.0:
Rewrote everything. Everything is now configurable.
Added a configuration GUI.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.1.0: Death chest coordinates are now sent in chat to the player who died.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.0: Fixed Cubic Chunks and Wearable Backpacks compatibility.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.3.0: The death chest no longer drops by default. This can be changed in the config.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2.0: Changed the gamerule to "dontSpawnDeathChests", which is false by default.

1.12.1.1.12.2-1.10.3.1: Fixed shulker boxes in death chests being deleted when the death chests are broken.
